name: dfiin2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))

stmt.origin: mprg(s0, c0, wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))))), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))

-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:

-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

body.origin:

-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Alternate definition of indexed intersection when ` B ` is a set. Definition 15(b) of [Suppes] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jun-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
